item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Overview The Archives Unleashed Project consists of four major tools: the Archives Unleashed Cloud, the Archives Unleashed Toolkit, the Archives Unleashed Jupyter Notebooks and Warclight. Tool Skill What it Does What You Need Ideal For Beginner The Archives Unleashed Cloud is a web-based platform for working with Archive-It collections. Drawing on your Archive-It credentials, you can sync your collections, run basic analyses, and generate a standardized set of research derivatives: full text, network diagrams, and basic statistics on your collection.
